titleStmt.title: Bells founder confounded, or Sabinianus confuted: with his damnable sect Written by a lover of musick, especially in churches.
titleStmt.author: Chidley, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: A lover of musick = Samuel Chidley.
Caption title on p. 1: Babels bells confounded by Sions arguments.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
